ygData.subject: Re: Main Battery Demo for Megatron
ygData.msgSnippet: I d watch your tongue lad, Panzertron said flatly, You don t have the upper hand on this ship. Besides it appears you gain much more then we do. Allitron

 "I'd watch your tongue lad," Panzertron said flatly," You don't have 
the upper hand on this ship. Besides it appears you gain much more 
then we do."

  Allitron nodded," But then again Major he brings about a good 
point. The maximals know this ship is here and they will do anything 
to stop her. In fact-helm change course to bearing three-one-zero, 
maintain speed."

  "Aye sir," the drone spun the wheel and the ship began her turn.

  "Precaution," Allitron said," She can't hide like your stationary 
bases can Megatron so Iron Fist does what she can to keep unwanted 
off her tail."

  " What of the Alliance?" Panzertron asked.

  "The Alliance leader and his party have turned back and according 
to thier communications they don't feel that unless Zardus talks to 
us himself we aren't worth thier time." Allitron said.






--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, crow_lord@h... wrote:
> Scorponok
> 
> 
>    Scorponok quickly answered the question Allitron asked Megatron, 
> "you would gain an ally in this  war and if you ever need to run we 
> could house you for a little while, and if you don't allied with 
us, 
> then we might just have to kill you." Scorponok says all this then 
> adds a nervous laugh. "It would be the best for everyone, except 
for 
> our enemys, if we join forces." Scorponok looks over to Darkmouse 
and 
> gives a nervous grin.
